title:
On the extension of one-parameter operator semigroups to completions of
  Archimedean vector lattices
abstract:
Extensions of one-parameter operator semigroups on Archimedean vector
lattices to their order/ru-completions are studied. Existence and uniqueness of
the extension to the ru-completion is established in the class of positive
semigroups. An extension theorem for positive ru-continuos semigroups on vector
lattices with property (R) is proved. This theorem allows one to abandon the
requirement of ru-completeness in various results concerning positive
ru-continuous semigroups.
